root.str: Increases the amount of rockets carried

Adds the Intake 004 to the Galaxy.
Call in an A.N.V.I.L. from your outfit armory.
Adds a bumper to your Sunderer. NC use only.
You can adjust your control scheme in the settings menu.
The preview of your purchase has failed. Please try again.
A forward grip increases control of the weapon, reducing horizontal recoil by 25%.
Cannot deploy in a no-deploy zone. Item has been refunded.
Increases the vertical thrust speed of the Galaxy by 15KPH.
NS35 Frag Cannon Right Auraxium Medal

<font color="#4BBA59">Auraxium</font> is the most common resource type. Many Outfit-Owned bases provide periodic Auraxium gain, and participating in a base capture will always provide your Outfit with some amount of Auraxium.

To the left is a handy guide to all the amazing items you can construct. The <font color="#7ff4ff">components</font> listed on the <font color="#7ff4ff">left</font> of each plan will yield the <font color="#7ff4ff">result</font> on the <font color="#7ff4ff">right.</font>
Enemy infantry and MAX units within 2 meters of you receive 18% more damage when attacked from the rear.
You were killed because you were too close to the vehicle pad.
Attaches a 1.25x optical zoom to your weapon.
Increases the ammo dispense range to 30 meters.
The deploy location is too close to other deployables
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 350 rounds.
Adds Lumifiber Trim to the Vanguard. NC use only.
C-4 Explosives are capable of incredible damage to infantry and vehicles alike.
Hostiles are attacking a control node!
Apply the single use Amerish Scrub camo pattern to your weapon. VS use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
This Terran field optic has no magnification, and highlights nearby vehicles and infantry by using infrared signatures. It's used primarily at medium-close range in low-light conditions.
Adds yellow chassis lights to the under carriage of the Flash. NC use only.
While in the region, soldiers belonging to the facilities faction gain mild health regeneration.

MERIT
Capturing and defending bases with outfitmates earns Merit, which can be spent onboard Sanctuary.

Max 20,000.
Applies an Alpha Squad decal to your vehicle.
Apply the single use Amerish Scrub camo pattern to your armor. VS use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
Applies a decal to your vehicle. All factions can use this gear.
Wearable by all non-Max classes. NC use only.
Releases powerful arcs of electricity to nearby enemies
Applies a decal to your armor. TR use only.
You have chosen a name that is profane. Please choose a non-profane name with no spaces or special characters.

Terran Republic Holiday Hat.
+50% xp when worn
This item is only usable during the winter holiday season.
Increases the Idle Timer on the Prowler to 18 minutes.
Blades are for cosmetic purposes only. Do not attempt to disembowel your opponents with your helmet. TR use only.

The semi-automatic Special Purpose Rifle (SPR) is a marksman rifle built on the highly-configurable Gauss platform. Developed after the start of the Auraxis War, it has remained in use due to its accuracy when making long-distance shots. NC use only.
Kills grant increased rate of fire for a time.
Adds 15 rounds to the default magazine size.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 24 rounds.
A vehicle cosmetic that will help your enemies get into the holiday spirit as you mercilessly mow them down.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 6 shells.
Failed to remove player from squad
Next Rank: Increase reload speed bonus to 48%.
Apply the Grey camo pattern to your weapon.

<font color="#00FFAA">Umatherin:</font> Keep in mind that you will need to manually activate the Scanner in order to update its gauge. And the closer you get to your target, the more that gauge will be filled.
Increases resource gain by 30% and squad resource gain by 3% for 1 hour. Boost can only be used on this character.

A single-shot shotgun round attachment; increases the equip time of the attached weapon.

Pressing Gear Slot 1 hotkey will toggle the attachment.
ANTs harvest Cortium which can then be deposited into Silos, used to create construction objects, as well as fuel the ANT's special abilities.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 600 rounds.
TR Light Assault Personal Shield Rank 1
Failed to kick player from the platoon because you are not the platoon leader.
While out of combat, having an Engineer onboard will repair ESF, Heavy Fighter, Valkyrie, Liberator, and Galaxies for the equivalent of rank 1 Nanite Auto-Repair.
Press [%s] to take NE-11 Portable Mining Laser

The opulent NS-11CG is a variant of the 11C, a carbine well known for its stability and all-around performance. The 11CG is also known for all that, as well as looking good. All factions can use NS weapons.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 72 missiles.
VS - Pistol - Mid - V4 Description(Delete Me -BB)
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 10 shells.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 24 shots.
Facilities that are being captured do not provide lattice connectivity.

<font color="#00FFAA">Narrator Drone:</font> Always the romantic, Campner, veteran Facilitator for the Nanite Systems Operatives has been mapping the best locations on Auraxis to view the relentless siege on each continent.
Adds 5 rounds to the default magazine size.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 6.25%

A single-shot incendiary launcher attachment; increases the equip time of the attached weapon by 0.25 seconds.

Pressing Gear Slot 1 hotkey will toggle the attachment.
The AF-34 Mattock features increased effective range in comparison to the other MAX anti-infantry weapons. NC use only.
Decreases the Charge reuse timer to 36 seconds
Stormglider drones can only be deployed in the storm on Esamir
Allows the use of low rocket-assisted jumps with a short cooldown.

The white-hot flames pouring out of this Nanite Systems helmet will be sure to strike fear into the hearts of your enemies.
During the Halloween Event, this helmet grants+20% xp when worn.
Weapon can be fired faster after sprinting. Lasts 2 hours. Rank 24 required.
Travel underwater on foot or in a submerged vehicle to earn progress toward this directive.
Unlock mobility boosting Certifications for the Magrider's performance slot. Performance slot items can be equipped on the loadout screen.
<font color="#00FFAA">Facilitator Campner:</font> Welcome to Oshur, operative. Each empire has a reason to be here. None of them want the others to know. And they're all paying us to help.

It's time to get back into the fight, soldier! This bundle comes with hard hitting vehicle and anti-vehicle weaponry. This bundle contains VS, NC, and TR item equivalents, and we've added an extra banner specific to NSO characters as well! Boosts are only available on the character who purchases the bundle.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 42 rounds.
A single-shot shotgun round that is highly effective in close quarters combat. The added weight increases the equip time of the attached weapon.
Customize your soldier's voice with this Kommando Voice Pack. NC Female use only.
A special edition Sigma hardlight armor. For NC heavy assault only.
Adds 9 rounds to the default magazine size.
<font color="#00FFAA">Gunnery Officer:</font> Damage report! The fore belly component has been damaged.
Apply the single use Indar Dry Brush camo pattern to your vehicle. TR use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.

Apply the Purple Chrome camo pattern to your armor.
You can switch weapons and items by pressing your weapon slot keys or by scrolling the mouse wheel.
Apply the single use California Scrub camo pattern to your weapon. VS use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 12 rounds.
Earn resupply experience by activating your ability and dropping Ammunition Packages near allies.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 10 bombs.
Killing an enemy while wielding a melee weapon restores 325 health. This effect does not trigger on quick melee attacks.
Unlock passive, always-on Certifications for the Liberator.
You are not the squad leader.
Applies a decal to your vehicle. TR use only.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 24 shots.
You are better than this. Show them.
Reveals spotted targets' health bars and increases how long you can hold your breath.
Mounted on the right wing engine of the Galaxy, this secondary weapon covers the area to the right. Operated by the passenger in seat 5.

This is the <font color="#FF574B">Terran Republic</font>. A short-sighted and tyrannical regime, they believe Auraxis belongs to them and only them. Their blind aggression towards us only impedes humanity's destiny with Vanu.
Increases the ammo capacity of the weapon to 860 rounds.
Welcome to Auraxis. Our Field Commander is aware of your arrival and is waiting for you with more orders.
Customize your ground vehicle by adding a "9" Gold Hood Ornament.
This is a prototype Valkyrie configuration can harvest and deposit Cortium.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 270.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 20 rounds.
Apply the Starburst camo pattern to your armor. VS use only.
Illuminates low light levels up to 1000 meters in a green monochrome display.
Customize your aircraft with these sleek Chrome Tiger Fins. VS use only.
Increases the speed at which an Infiltrator can hack enemy equipment terminals by 20%.
Kill MAX units while the Maximum Pressure event is active.
Capture and hold all 3 Tech Plants on Hossin
Neutral core has been claimed by the [*faction*]!
Allows the use of the Scrambler, which disrupts nearby enemy's minimap
Adds Lumifiber Trim to the Harasser. NSO use only.
Adds 1 missile to the default magazine size.
<font color="#00FFAA">Coordinator Tolland:</font> Thanks for your hard work! Sending the payment now for a job well done.
Increases the hill climbing ability of the Lightning by 25%.
Soldier, can you hear me? Looks like some of your memory was lost during the last respawn. These things happen from time to time. We need to run some tests before sending you back to the battlefield.
We've got a hostile cloaker nearby.
Decreases the turret's cooldown between shots to 5 seconds.
Adds 10 rounds to the default magazine size.

Thumper impacts now slow the movement, reload, and firing rate of infantry targets by 20% for up to 3 seconds, but blast damage is reduced to 250. <font color="#dc9c36">This item expires at the end of the Campaign.</font>
This armor can only be worn by NC Infiltrators.
Adds Lumifiber Trim to the Sunderer. NSO use only.
<font color="#00FFAA">Warden Hadley:</font> Collect the researcher's datapad and bring it back to the flotilla. We can't let it fall into enemy hands.
The MR1 Fracture is a dual rotary cannon that fires self-propelled, high velocity rockets designed specifically to penetrate vehicle armor. TR use only.
Celebrate eight years of PlanetSide 2 with this special bundle. Note: Bundle contains weapons and cosmetics for all empires.
Contains a MR1 Fracture plus 1000 Certs
The garage at the top of the hill seems like a defensible place out of sight of the enemy. We can deploy our Sunderer inside.
Single Use Indar Dry Brush Camo
When aiming at a spotted enemy, their health bar will appear. Also increases the range at which enemies will illuminate your crosshair.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.4 seconds.

Decreases the time needed to reload weapon by 6.25%

Originally pitched as a research tool to measure Anomaly variance, the Ectoblaster releases a barrage of plasma before overheating. Users are cautioned not to cross the streams.

Limited event item.
The Tank Destroyer turret is ideal for penetrating the rear armor of enemy tanks; making this one of the most deadly weapons in the game.
The [*faction*] has captured all Major Facilities +[*points*] VP!
Input devices are disabled or not present.

Applies a banner to your character. NC use only.
Each region has a facility which controls ownership of the region. Capture this facility to own the region.
The anti-armor TMIR-6 Brazer features a high pressure flame at alloy-melting temperatures, allowing it to cut through even the thickest of tank armor.
Apply the Amerish Scrub camo pattern to your vehicle. All factions can use this gear.

Nanite Systems set the standard for quality long-range optics with the HeXO sniper scope. It comes equipped with a mil-dot crosshair at 6x magnification.

Celebrate the 18-year legacy of PlanetSide with this special bundle. This bundle grants cosmetics for VS, NC, and TR.
Unlock the Outfit Armor Decal item from the Depot or Loadouts.
Increases fuel capacity and regeneration speed by 20%.
Earn this ribbon by overloading, stabilizing, and destroying generators and SCUs. Hacking enemy terminals also grants credit towards this ribbon.

Adds 20 rounds to the default magazine size.

Adds 4 grenades to the default magazine size.
Improve cruising speed, vertical thrust, and roll rate.

Activate to repair 12% of the MAX's health over 12 seconds. Can be activated once every 45 seconds.

Reverse-engineered from ancient Vanu tech, the Spiker makes use of a standard 2x burst, as well as an alternate firing mode which charges up an armor piercing blast.

<font color="#00FFAA">Warden Hadley:</font> Hey, soldier. The New Conglomerate soldiers have risen to the task of weathering the storms of Esamir and healing the damage inflicted by the warpgate's destruction.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 1200 rounds.
Perfect for mid-range combat flexing into long-range, the O2-7 provides confidence on the battlefield.
Kills while wielding a sidearm increase reload speed by 20% for 2.75 seconds.

Purchase an enlistment contract that will set your default faction assignment to the Vanu Sovereignty. While this contract is active, you will be able to join Vanu Soveriegnty Outfits. You may purchase a new contract at any time.

All Access Membership is required for contract purchase. Memberships that become inactive will place this character in the Freelance state, and prevent certain Outfit interactions, but will not boot you from an Outfit you are currently a part of. Contracts cannot be purchased by players currently within an Outfit.
Additional composite plating to complement the look of your soldier. TR use only.
Reduces damage taken from flak by 20%, and small arms and ESF nose guns by 6%.
Reduce the acquire timer of the Scythe and Liberator for 2 hours. Rank 30 required.
Assure complete distruction of the enemy's main battle tanks.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 10 shots.
Outfits can use their Armory to construct and place Facility Modules at allied bases. These modules provide buffs for allies fighting at the region.

Enemy infantry and MAX units within 2 meters of you receive 20% more damage when attacked from the rear. In addition, you no longer receive a movement speed penalty while back pedaling.

While not as important to lore, this character is incredibly important to the MMO genre and helped define true difficulty in MMOs. Mata Muram was the first boss to ever require specific players to perform timely actions, or else cause the raid to wipe. This boss was so difficult that it took 6 months for the first guild to kill it, and nearly another month for the second guild to kill it. A year after its release, a total of only 16 guilds had defeated Mata Muram.
Applies the Swamp Thang Decal to your vehicle.
An imposing set of horns for a helmet.
Unlock the NS-11AG Assault Rifle along with all the attachments an Operative needs. Only available to NS Operatives.

Exemplary of NC ingenuity and their utter disdain for rules, the aftermarket parts welded into the Brawler not only make it more accurate than typical shotguns, but also illegal to possess in the Terran Republic. Not that they care.
